title: 5Ksana_HandMade
author: 5Ksana_HandMade
content: Painting-embroidery "The Girl with the BITCOIN eye"12Condition: MINT 100%HandMade by 5KsanaLocation: PolandDelivery: International- Free."The Girl with the Bitcoin Eye" is a painting-embroidery created in the diptych technique. It consists of two parts, each of which represents a separate paintingMaterials:-Threads DMC” New Colors ” Embroidery Floss Pack;-DMC Gold Embroidery Hand Needles;-Fabric-Handmade decorative frameQuantity: 2 paintingsDimension:wide – 50 cm; height – 20 cm. About ME https://5ksana.art/about/_______________________________________________________________________________ _________________________________________________________Bid Format: Bids only in BTCStarting Bid: 0,3 BTC                            Bid Inc.: 0.001 BTCDelivery: worldwide shipping is freeAuction Ends: Wednesday, October  11th  12:00 PST

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Wow, this looks incredible. Did you "design/imagine" the look of the girl or did you have some reference?I especially love the right half, but think each side befeits from the other.Out of my price-league but all the best with your sale!

comments.author: 5Ksana_HandMade
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on October 06, 2023, 02:48:45 PMWow, this looks incredible. Did you "design/imagine" the look of the girl or did you have some reference?I especially love the right half, but think each side befeits from the other.Out of my price-league but all the best with your sale!Thank you! Yes, I designed it myself. I'm glad you liked the right side, but it's also great that each side has its unique charm. I understand that the price may be out of reach for everyone, but I appreciate your interest and support. Good luck to you too!

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Now this is some proper art..!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: 5Ksana_HandMade on October 06, 2023, 02:53:23 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on October 06, 2023, 02:48:45 PMWow, this looks incredible. Did you "design/imagine" the look of the girl or did you have some reference?I especially love the right half, but think each side befeits from the other.Out of my price-league but all the best with your sale!Thank you! Yes, I designed it myself. I'm glad you liked the right side, but it's also great that each side has its unique charm. I understand that the price may be out of reach for everyone, but I appreciate your interest and support. Good luck to you too!Thanks for your answer. I do like both sides! Right is my slight fav, but truely with the left as contrast it shows it's full uniqueness.Also let me clarify I don't think this is over-priced or anything of that sort. Hope you'll find the right collector that values the effort put into this.Totally unique piece!
